resources.string: arrow connecting start time to end time

Welcome to the write process.
Please make sure you have an empty tag ready
and NFC turned on.

If there are any other NFC tags in the vicinity,
remove them now!

Please put your phone down onto the tag
and do not move it.
The write process will begin as soon
as your phone detects the tag.
Write in progress, you will be redirected shortly.

Write was successful.
Your first session recording will start
as soon as you click %1$s.

You can also lift your phone now to avoid recording
a first session.

NFC connection could not be established.
Please try again.
If this persists, feel free to open
an issue on our GitHub.

Error Text:
